title: Badman in Japan's Fall
info:
I continued writing musics for our PPP Team Software games, hardly waiting the new Game Maker 2 running under Clicker 32 OS, developped by my brother Pype !
So i wrote an asiatic songs that suite to the japanese waterfall of the first episode of Badman. In that special stage, our hero donâ€™t use his astroflasher but have a samurai weapon to fight ninjas !

project game : Badman I, homebrew video game by PPP Team Software
project download : http://www.aderack.com/game-maker/index.php?title=Badman
